text: Hunters Run is a tributary to Neshannock Creek in western Pennsylvania. The stream rises in northeastern Lawrence County and flows northwest entering Neshannock Creek near Springfield Falls, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 32% agricultural, 60% forested and the rest is other uses. This watershed drains the northern portion of State Game Lands #284 and is the location for Springfield Falls, a prominent waterfall on the run. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Beaver River Category:Rivers of Lawrence County, Pennsylvania Category:Rivers of Mercer County, Pennsylvania
title: Hunters Run (Neshannock Creek tributary)
